title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 578.6 - Method for determining overall wetland value
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 578.6 - Method for determining overall wetland value

State Regulations

Where a wetland contains multiple values based upon more
than one factor listed in section
578.5
of this Part: (a) The overall wetland value will be no
lower than its highest associated value. (b) Three or more medium value
characteristics (3) will raise a wetland associated value to high
(2). (c) Three or more high value
characteristics (2) will raise a wetland associated value to highest
(1). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
578.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
